column2: I've arranged to meet with a respected breeder who offers me a selection of mounts for sale. "They're each healthy, even-tempered, and combat-ready," the breeder remarks with an assuring nod. I just need to take my pick.\n!!! WARNING : YOU ARE IN AI PURCHASE MODE !!!

I've arranged to meet with a respected breeder who offers me a huge selection of mounts for sale. "They're each healthy, even-tempered, and combat-ready," the breeder remarks with an assuring nod, "but it was pretty expensive to ship the more exotic ones all the way over here to [Root.Capital.GetName]."
Page 1/8 : Horses 1\n\n"Perhaps one of these horses takes your fancy?"
Page 2/8 : Horses 2\n\n"We have other breeds of horses over here..."
Page 3/8 : Horses 3\n\n"There are yet more breeds of horses in the third paddock..."
Page 4/8 : Camels\n\n"These camels would be an excellent choice if you value resilience under the hot desert sun!"
Page 5/8 : Morrowind\n\n"The Dunmer swear by their own regional mounts."
Page 6/8 : Black Marsh\n\n"For performance in swampy terrain, you absolutely must choose one of the mounts bred by the Argonians of Black Marsh!"
Page 7/8 : Khajiit\n\n"The most fearsome Khajiiti warriors ride into battle on the backs of their Senche and Pahmar brethren."
Page 8/8 : Exit/Restart\n\n"That's all I have to offer, I'm afraid!"
For you... Hmm... Yes... I think these are the most suitable.\n\nYou're not entirely sure you trust his judgement... but, on the other hand, you are in quite a rush...
Perhaps you would like to browse my entire selection and choose for yourself?
([Root.mount_rouncey_cost.GetValue]) The Rouncey looks like a solid choice.
([Root.mount_cerigyn_cost.GetValue]) The Cerigyn Nojan looks like a solid choice.
([Root.mount_jennet_cost.GetValue]) That Altmeri Jennet would be a swift and nimble steed!
([Root.mount_mountain_cost.GetValue]) A Nordic Mountain Horse is a strong, tough creature indeed.
([Root.mount_destrier_cost.GetValue]) That Colovian Destrier looks like a magnificent war horse.
([Root.mount_courser_cost.GetValue]) I'm sure that Iliac Courser will be an excellent war horse.
([Root.mount_palfrey_cost.GetValue]) A Bretonnian Palfrey is a wonderful multipurpose steed.
([Root.mount_hobbeye_cost.GetValue]) I'll take that West Reach Hobbeye - reliability is never bad.
([Root.mount_mijako_cost.GetValue]) That Tsaesci Mijako seems like a quick and powerful creature.
([Root.mount_camel_h_cost.GetValue]) Not many beasts can compare to the resilience of a Hammerfell Camel.
([Root.mount_camel_p_cost.GetValue]) An Ottaka Camel is a beast of burden with almost unmatched tenacity.
([Root.mount_guar_c_cost.GetValue]) That Velothi Charger looks quite sturdy.
([Root.mount_guar_s_cost.GetValue]) That Vvardenfell Snapper has quite the temper. An excellent war mount!
([Root.mount_guar_f_cost.GetValue]) A Blackmarsh Flanker carries with it superior alacrity.
([Root.mount_kagouti_cost.GetValue]) A Kagouti? Quite a novelty, but also quite fearsome!
([Root.mount_shellback_cost.GetValue]) A Shellback would be like my own personal armored carriage!
([Root.mount_pahmar_cost.GetValue]) It is not often that a sleek Pahmar offers their services - you're hired!
([Root.mount_senche_cost.GetValue]) It is not often that a mighty Senche offers their services - you're hired!
([Root.mount_rouncey_cost.GetValue]) I cannot afford this Rouncey!
([Root.mount_cerigyn_cost.GetValue]) I cannot afford this Cerigyn Nojan!
